Player History
Signed as a free agent by Pittsburgh on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,624,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1985...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1985, off Andy McGaffigan (CIN)...

Won Cy Young Award in 1986, going 20-8, 2.37 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by New York (Y) on 2/23/1990 to a 1-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 9/22/1990 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
